name: Astronaut training (Ludum Dare 47)
description:
Hello, 

This game was made in less than 72 hours for the ludum dare 47.

I tried for my self the browser version but wasn't really good. The game lagged a little bit. I recommend you to use the link for the downloadable version.

Thank you! have fun

I'm sorry for QWERTY users, i forgot to bind the keys. you stil use arrow key to move.

CONTROL :

Left click to shoot/ arrow keys or QSDZ to move.

RATE THE GAME AT : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/astronaut-training
